reference.shortdesc: The syntaxdiagram element represents the syntax of a command, function call, or programming language statement.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The syntaxdiagram element is specialized from fig. It is defined in the syntax diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and .

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, a syntaxdiagram is used to illustrate the syntax of a basic file-copy command. The initial COPYF command is followed by the input directory and file name. The input is followed by a choice of either an output directory (and optional file name) or a file name.
